First strike
Whenever Ria attacks, create a token that's a copy of target artifact you control. If you create an Equipment token this way, you may attach it to a creature you control. If you create a Vehicle token this way, you may have it become an artifact creature until end of turn that's tapped and attacking.

If an opponent would create one or more tokens, instead you and that player each create those tokens.
If an opponent would draw a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, instead you both draw a card.
Destroy all artifacts and creatures.
